welcomeTextBox: We are a restaurant dedicated to providing exactly the burger that you want. Here at Indie Burgers we love to create the best individual burger just for you.
cardTerminal: Follow instructions in the card terminal...
updateInstr: To update stock of an ingredient, fill in the difference here and press the 'update' button corresponding to said ingredient:
description:
We believe in individual people who want the opportunity to choose, to make personalized burgers.
You choose ingredients with the plus-button and when you have made a burger you are happy with use the "add to order" button. Then you can continue making one more burger if you wish. Otherwise go to checkout for payment.
We have a requirement that a burger may contain a maximum of one bread and two steaks/patties. Best regards Indie Burgers
